title: Is there a way to tell if a skin has been on sale recently?
body:
I was wondering if a certain skin had been on sale yet, is there like an official database with that information? I want to get this skin, but I want to get it on sale, but if it's already been on sale, then I'll probably just not worry about it.

Specifically I am concerned about Elderwood LeBlanc.

replies.body:
This probably can help you.
http://www.lolskill.net/sales
AH, missed the sale in August. Such is life. Thanks, man.

You can find a history of sales on [this page.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) There are also some third party websites that archive sales data and present dates on the last time a skin was on sale and if it's expected to go on sale soon, so I recommend hitting Google for those.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
